sn35.16:1.3: Yāvatā rūpānaṃ assādo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35.16:1.6: Yāvatā rūpānaṃ ādīnavo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35.16:1.9: Yāvatā rūpānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ, paññāya me taṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ.
sn35.16:1.16: Yāvatā dhammānaṃ assādo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35.16:1.19: Yāvatā dhammānaṃ ādīnavo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35.16:1.22: Yāvatā dhammānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ, paññāya me taṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ.
sn35.16:2.1: Yāvakīvañcāhaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ channaṃ bāhirānaṃ āyatanānaṃ assādañca assādato, ādīnavañca ādīnavato, nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ nābbhaññāsiṃ …pe… paccaññāsiṃ.
sn35.16:2.3: ‘akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
